answers.answer: You have OvCa and still have your ovaries????  How do they know that it is OvCa?  The only way to diagnosis is by a biospy?Growing up I had a friend with PCOS and she was put on Birth Control Pills.Best of luck to you.

Hi,yeah i have had ovarian cancer for 2 years now. I have had 3 major surgeries including laporotomy plus my right ovary removed they have left my left ovary as i am only 24 and i have non invasive implants which need to be observed and can only be removed through surgery. Plus PCOS and endometriosis and now type 2 diabetes which is meant to me common for women with hormonal probs and they are actually stidying a link betweenPCOS and OVCA so i was wondering if anyone knew how to treat PCOS to get the insulin resistance under control.
i am workin with one of the 3 top doctors australia wide. He is head of gyno oncology in Brisbane.

question: Hi guys,Already knew i had endometriosis , polcystic ovaries (PCOS)nd OVCA but now i may have type II diabetes due to an insulin resistance problem cause by the PCOS!Does anyone have reccommendations or success on how to treat PCOS?All the best!x
title: OVCA, PCOS, endometriosis and now type II diabetes!
